entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 1. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 06:00 AM ADT Friday 29 April 2016
